Description: Vibra Healthcare LLC, a national hospital chain headquartered in Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania, agreed to $32.7 million, plus interest, to resolve claims that it violated the False Claims Act by billing Medicare for medically unnecessary services.

Info Source: Included in a dataset downloaded at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $10,001 to $50,000.
